title: Sturdis Kids Toy Box – Gray & White with Cushion Storage Bench Seat, Toy Storage Chest And Cubby Space For Shoes And Books Organizers
features: MULTIPURPOSE SEAT AND STORAGE: 2 in 1 storage space with top opening storage chest and separate cubby holes for shoes or books. Top cushion is included to make this extra roomy toy chest the perfect piece to style as part of a reading area.
CHILD SAFE DESIGN: Your child’s safety comes first with soft cupboard closures and safety hinge.
NO MORE CLUTTER: Additional cubby holes at bottom allow separate organization of toys, books and shoes.
MODERN AND STYLISH: Clean, simple and sophisticated design allows for easy styling with all home décor.
SPECIFICATIONS: Dimension 18.9” (H) x 31.1”(L) x 15.7” (D), Weight 35lbs, Material: MDF, Polyester Cushion with star prints.
